body_html:
@k-chaney awesome, thanks for this - I'll take note in case I run into a similar issue in the future

@soumith thanks for making the change so quickly - I think there was something else wrong with my build env that caused some downstream errors, I was able to resolve them by removing any unnecessary package installs and reverting to the provided caffe2 Dockerfile's (specifically caffe2ai/caffe2:c2v0.8.1.cpu.min.ubuntu16.04)
body_text:

@soumith thanks for making the change so quickly - I think there was something else wrong with my build env that caused some downstream errors, I was able to resolve them by removing any unnecessary package installs and reverting to the provided caffe2 Dockerfile's (specifically caffe2ai/caffe2:c2v0.8.1.cpu.min.ubuntu16.04)
body:
@k-chaney awesome, thanks for this - I'll take note in case I run into a similar issue in the future

@soumith thanks for making the change so quickly - I think there was something else wrong with my build env that caused some downstream errors, I was able to resolve them by removing any unnecessary package installs and reverting to the provided caffe2 Dockerfile's (specifically caffe2ai/caffe2:c2v0.8.1.cpu.min.ubuntu16.04)
